verses.verse: Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance.<s%>

<S%H4872>"Moses<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> however, shall <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but they shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up with him."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>recounted<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do!<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H3789>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Then he <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> with <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4676>pillars<s%> for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> as <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> [it] in <S%H101>basins,<s%> and the [other] <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> [it] in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>"All<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do,<s%> and we will be <S%H8085>obedient!<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> [it] on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3772>made<s%> with you in <S%H5921>accordance<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>"
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> His <S%H7272>feet<s%> there appeared to be a <S%H3843>pavement<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> as <S%H2892>clear<s%> as the <S%H8064>sky<s%> <S%H6106>itself.<s%>

Yet He did not <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out His <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H678>nobles<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H2372>beheld<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and they <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up to Me on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> with the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3789>written<s%> for their <S%H3384>instruction.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> his <S%H8334>servant,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

But to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3427>"Wait<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%> for us <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we <S%H7725>return<s%> to you. And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> are with you; <S%H4310>whoever<s%> has a legal <S%H1697>matter,<s%> let him <S%H5066>approach<s%> them."
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7931>rested<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> He <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>

And to the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was like a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H7218>top.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> as he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
